thread.title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
thread.title_full: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton

title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
text: > Sports A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton Formula 1 race car driver Lewis Hamilton races a go-kart against four young motorsports fans at K1 Speed Indoor Kart Racing in Austin, Texas, on Wednesday Oct.21, 2015. Hamilton spent time with the children as part of a promotional appearance for Epson, a sponsor of Mercedes AMG Petronas Formual 1 team. (Jay Janner/Austin American-Statesman via AP) AUSTIN CHRONICLE OUT, COMMUNITY IMPACT OUT, INTERNET AND TV MUST CREDIT PHOTOGRAPHER AND STATESMAN.COM, MAGS OUT; MANDATORY CREDIT
